auth.password_redefinition_description: Type your E-mail and if an account exists we will send an url to your E-mail address containing the password reset url.

success_msgs.title: Success!
success_msgs.demote_msg: The selected integrant is now a band member!
success_msgs.promote_msg: The selected integrant is now a band admin!
success_msgs.remove_member_msg: The selected integrant was removed from the band!
success_msgs.owner_transfer_msg: The selected integrant is now the band owner!
success_msgs.invite_msg: The selected musician was invited to join your band!
success_msgs.save_band_without_logo_msg: The band was successfully saved but an error ocourred while uploading your logo image.
success_msgs.remove_category_msg: The selected category was successfully deleted!
success_msgs.confirmation_mail_msg: An E-mail containing the reset url was sent.
success_msgs.account_created_msg: Hello {{name}} Your account was successfully created!

error_msgs.demote_denied_msg: You lack permissions to manage member roles!
error_msgs.demote_error_msg: An error has ocourred while demoting the selected member! Try again later.
error_msgs.promote_denied_msg: You lack permissions to manage member roles!
error_msgs.promote_error_msg: An error has ocourred while promoting the selected member! Try again later.
error_msgs.band_remove_denied: You lack permissions to delete this band!
error_msgs.band_remove_error: An error has ocourred while deleting the band! Try again later.
error_msgs.remove_member_denied_msg: You lack permissions in the band to remove members!
error_msgs.remove_member_error_msg: An error has ocourred while removing the selected member! Try again later.
error_msgs.owner_transfer_denied_msg: You lack permissions to transfer band ownership!
error_msgs.owner_transfer_error_msg: An error has ocourred while transfering ownership! Try again later.
error_msgs.invited_already_msg: The selected musician was already invited to join this band! Please wait the answer.
error_msgs.invited_denied_msg: You lack permissions in the band to invite new members!
error_msgs.invited_error_msg: An error has ocourred while inviting the selected musician! Try again later.
error_msgs.invalid_form_msg: There is invalid dat in your form. Please verify it.
error_msgs.save_band_error_msg: An error has ocourred while saving the band! Try again later.
error_msgs.remove_category_denied_msg: You lack permissions in the band to remove categories!
error_msgs.remove_category_error_msg: An error has ocourred while removing the category! Try again later.
error_msgs.save_category_denied_msg: You lack permissions in the band to save categories!
error_msgs.save_category_error_msg: An error has ocourred while saving the category! Try again later.
error_msgs.email_already_taken_msg: This E-mail address is already in use by another account.
error_msgs.email_send_error_msg: An error ocourred while reseting your password. Try again later!
error_msgs.username_in_use_msg: Username or E-mail already in use by another account!
error_msgs.username_error_msg: An error ocourred while creating your account. Try again later!
